data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Name something you do when you are feeling creative. How does this activity open your imagination? What can your friends learn from you to improve their creativity?
data.answer: I feel creative when I am doing visual design. Visual design can be applied to anywhere in our lives including logo design, furniture design, tattoo design, poster design, and origami design. I usually have so many essence and ideas when doing visual design and I feel so creative. It is just about thinking of random stuff and using the elements from random stuff as an inspiration to create a totally different thing. Visual design is actually helping me to build a customary non-regulated way of thinking, and my friends learnt this mindset from me and found it so useful in solving problems in reality.
